casebody.data:
GODETT
v.
STATE of NC, et al. 279P18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 24, 2018 Aaron Godett, for Godett, Aaron.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 28th of August 2018 by Plaintiff for Suit for Punitive Damages and Compensatory Damanges:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 24th of October 2018."
